# AVAsyncProperty

**Class**

An asynchronous property that constrains its type and value.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVAsyncProperty<Root, Value>
```

## Overview

This class subclasses [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPartialAsyncProperty] to provide a type constraint on the property value.

## Accessing the status

- **AVAsyncProperty.Status**: Loaded status values for asynchronous properties.

## Property loading

- **AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading**: A protocol that defines the interface to load media data asynchronously.
- **AVPartialAsyncProperty**: An asynchronous property that constrains its type.
- **AVAnyAsyncProperty**: A base class for asynchronous properties.

## Inherits From

- AVPartialAsyncProperty

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
